speaker: Third Soldier
text_entry: SCENE X. Between the two camps.

speaker: Third Soldier
text_entry: Enter MARK ANTONY and SCARUS, with their Army

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Their preparation is to-day by sea;

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: We please them not by land.

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: I would they'ld fight i' the fire or i' the air;

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: We'ld fight there too. But this it is; our foot

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Upon the hills adjoining to the city

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Shall stay with us: order for sea is given;

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: They have put forth the haven

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Where their appointment we may best discover,
